title: phatloot『战利品箱子插件』
txt_content:
创建好一个名为generate的箱子，输入/loot link generate 之后显示出一段文字『十字准心是对准箱子的，且手上没有任何物品』，求解决方法.
An error occured while trying to perform command. Please notify a server administrator

replies.author: 名副其实
replies.txt_content:
[16:07:02] [Server thread/WARN] [com.codisimus.plugins.phatloots.PhatLoots]: [PhatLoots] PhatLoot ??????? does not exist.
[16:07:02] [Server thread/WARN] [com.codisimus.plugins.phatloots.PhatLoots]: [PhatLoots] Please adjust your config or create the PhatLoot
转码错误
或者是这个插件根本不支持你的服务器

replies.author: sunjood
replies.txt_content: 检查一下插件的配置文件编码格式对不对
如何检查？编码格式都不知道是多少
